  • *Job Summary**
Serves as a member of the Enterprise Big Data team working together with other Data Engineer and Data Visualization roles as well as various internal customers to identify, address and resolve a variety of complex data modeling, data wrangling, and data representation challenges\. The role spans data management, analytics, and visualizations and is critical to the data discovery and data science processes\. This position works with large amounts of both structured and unstructured data to create common profiles for data elements to facilitate reusability\. This position is intricately involved in working with Data Scientists to visually represent the results of a hypothesis or Use Case, as well as working with the Data Development team to properly model new data feeds into the Hadoop ecosystem\. This role will also provide oversight and compliance to data security, privacy, and retention polices and processes for the Big Data Program\.
  • *Job Duties & Responsibilities**
Build large\-scale data processing systems using specific Hadoop\-based enterprise tools\.

? Leverages extensive knowledge of data warehousing techniques\.

+ Implements complex big data projects with a focus on collecting, parsing, managing, analyzing and visualizing large sets of data to turn information into insights using multiple platforms\.
+ Identify relationships between disparate datasets, as well as any additional factors that could affect the results of data profiles and data pipelines\.
+ Capable of quickly identifying, breaking down, and solving complex data\-oriented problems\.
+ Provide value\-add analysis to various business units through use of visualization software to guide analysis, drawing implications from analysis, and synthesizing into clear communications\.
+ Prepare data for processing by organizing information, checking for any inaccuracies, and adjusting and weighting the raw data\.
+ Perform quantitative and qualitative analyses to support strategic projects and initiatives\.
+ Process unstructured data into a form suitable for analysis ? and then do the analysis\. Education, Licenses and Certifications
